item.title: China vows to boost domestic consumption, tech self-reliance in next five years as Fourth Plenum wraps
item.description: China's top leaders signaled their priorities for the next five years in a readout released Thursday at the end of a four-day meeting.

item.title: With stock market concentration risk at peak, 'it's cash, precious metals, and then crypto' as new normal
